frontmatter.title: My Experience with the OSWA Certification
frontmatter.subtitle: Offensive Security Web Assessor
frontmatter.desc: In April of 2023 I passed the OSWA, a web application hacking certification. See how I did it, what I learned, and how you can pass it too!

frontmatter.title: Contributions OWASP Agentic AI Security
frontmatter.subtitle: OWASP GenAI Project
frontmatter.desc: I actively contribute to the OWASP GenAI Security Project by authoring & editing sections of their agentic security documents, such as the "Securing Agentic Applications Guide" and the "Agentic Security Landscape Report". My work helps provide the community with crucial resources and best practices for securing generative AI agents.
